# Asch Javascript Library

## Install

```
npm install btw-js
```

## Import

CommonJS

```
var BtwJS = require('btw-js');
```

Front end

```
<script type="text/javascript" src="/browserify-btw.js"></script>
# or
<script type="text/javascript" src="/browserify-btw-min.js"></script>

console.log(window.BtwJS)
```
